name: De-Art
description: DeArt is a global accessories manufacturer specializing in high-quality leather goods and fashion accessories, with a strong focus on sustainability and innovation. The company integrates smart manufacturing, recycled leather, and upcycling to create luxury products for designer brands. With production hubs in China, Italy, and Cambodia, DeArt combines craftsmanship with advanced technology to deliver customized, eco-friendly solutions for the fashion industry.

features.title: Smart & Sustainable Manufacturing
features.subtitle: Combines advanced technology with eco-friendly practices for high efficiency and minimal waste.

features.subtitle: Facilities in China, Italy, and Cambodia ensure flexible, high-quality, and cost-effective solutions.
